reviews.name: Garry Myers
reviews.text: Excellent prices and customer service. Portajohns were also very clean and well maintained. Great business

reviews.name: Philip Marty
reviews.text: Zach is very responsive and friendly, portable toilets are clean and work well. Highly recommend

reviews.name: Andy Pflederer
reviews.text: I’ve used Sit & Git toilets and have found them consistently clean and well maintained… a big contrast to other experiences!

reviews.name: Kira Kennedy
reviews.text: Zach is great and so professional to work with! We were in immediate need of a portable toilet for our soccer field, and he dropped one off promptly. The toilets are always clean and well stocked with toilet paper and hand sanitizer. Highly recommend!
